title: Big Box Gyms
description: Big box gyms — corporate  gym,  chains you can  find in almost every city — offer a little bit of everything.They tend to have a massive area devoted to cardio equipment  plus (sometimes) other equipment and amenities.

title: Boutique Gyms
description: When most people think of gyms, they think of a  place they go to, work out, and leave.That’s changing with the growing popularity of boutique gyms.

title: Personal Training Gyms
description: While you can find personal , trainers at many ,  different kinds of gyms, this variety specializes in them.You won’t find big brand names in this section.

title: Women’s Gyms
description: Some women may not feel , comfortable , going,    to  a  regular gym.An article in Glamour detailed how some women feelharassment when they work out, which contributes to some women not getting as much.

title: CrossFit Gyms
description: After just 1 month of CrossFit, you can start noticing serious improvement in your figure.This method of high-intensity interval training has risen in popularity in recent years, and now, there are tons of gyms in every city that specialize in the format.

title: Powerlifting Gyms
description: When your goal is to bulk up or get crazy strong, you may want to sign up for a powerlifting gym.These locations are laser-focused on offering the most heavy-duty weight lifting equipment imaginable.
